popover.description: Whether to display the popover when dragging. Support passing in function to customize the rendering content.
popover.description_zh: 拖动时是否显示弹出窗口。支持传入函数自定义渲染内容。

residentPopover.description: Whether the popover is permanently displayed , this attribute takes effect when popover exists
residentPopover.description_zh: 弹出框是否永久显示，此属性在弹出框存在时生效

range.description: Whether it is a double sliders

step.description: Step distance, the value must be greater than 0, and (max-min) can be divisible by step. When marks is not null, the configuration of step is invalid
step.description_zh: 步距，该值必须大于 0，并且 （max-min） 可以按步长整除。当标记不为空时，步骤的配置无效

events.name: onAfterChange
events.description: Consistent with the trigger timing of touchend, pass the current value as a parameter
events.description_zh: 与 touchend 的触发时序一致，将当前值作为参数传递

events.name: onChange
events.description: Triggered when the slider is dragged, and the current dragged value is passed in as a parameter
events.description_zh: 在拖动滑块时触发，并将当前拖动的值作为参数传入
